name: Med Pita Burger

ingredients.name: ground chicken or lean ground beef
Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Creamy Garlic Hummus Dip Mix

preparation: In a large bowl, combine ground chicken, dip mix and lemon peel until well blended. Form into four patties.
Heat oil in a large, non-stick fry pan set over medium-high heat. When warm, add patties. Fry until brown and crispy around the edges, about 4–5 min per side, or until cooked through.
While burgers are cooking, toast pitas, if you wish. Cut tomatoes into wedges and measure cheese.
When burgers are done, slide onto warm pitas; top with spinach, tomato, cheese and additional toppings, as desired.
tips: Swap in 1⁄2 lb (225 g) ground meat with 2 cups cooked lentils.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 tbsp Dillicious Tzatziki and 1 cup sliced veggies, your choice.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
